answers.answer: I had protein in my urine and high blood pressure so they had me pee in a jug for 24 hours then surprisingly I went to my next appointment and everything was normal.. I got extremely scared and was stressing out over it for no reason.
So I had the exact opposite they cleared me the first time then I had a routen check up for the baby and no I have it and there keeping me in the hospital

This is my second and last pregnancy with it. Sounds like they've caught it early for you hun. Fingers crossed they can manage it and get you and baby a bit further along! I developed it with my first at 28wks and got to 35wks. This time developed it at 15wks and hoping to make it to 36wks. Take card!
I had pre eclampsia in last pregnancy and are you always prone to getting it again?, just curious I'm 21 +5 weeks

If anyone reads this I ended up having severe preeclampsia and almost dieing. I started having extreme head aches that I couldnt cure with medication and put on a lot of weight in less then a week. I started vomiting continuously. I almost had seizers They checked my blood pressure when I went into the hospital and it was at its highest point 189/116 so please if you have any symptoms please Do Not ignore them I didn't relieze how sick I was until after I had the emergency-c section having my daughter 6 weeks early. They told me after the fact I could have died several time.

question: So I have the start of preeclampsia does anyone else have this issue?
title: 33 weeks with preeclampsia
